ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Account__r.Customer_Compliance__c, 'US_Govern'), Name__r.NSA_Compliant__c <> TRUE, NOT(OR( Name__r.Profile.Name = 'PRM Partner Community User Login', Name__r.Profile.Name = 'PRM Partner Relationship Manager Login')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A non NSA Compliant User cannot be an Account Member of an NSA Account
